metadata.description: The startup datetime, as a string in UTC time, for scheduler purposes; example in parameters file is in MM/dd/yyyy H:mm:ss tt format
The shutdown datetime, as a string in UTC time, for scheduler purposes; example in parameters file is in MM/dd/yyyy H:mm:ss tt format

variables.wadCfgNetworkPerfCounter: <PerformanceCounterConfiguration counterSpecifier="\NetworkInterface\BytesTransmitted" sampleRate="PT15S" unit="Bytes"><annotation displayName="Network out guest OS" locale="en-us" /></PerformanceCounterConfiguration><PerformanceCounterConfiguration counterSpecifier="\NetworkInterface\BytesReceived" sampleRate="PT15S" unit="Bytes"><annotation displayName="Network in guest OS" locale="en-us" /></PerformanceCounterConfiguration><PerformanceCounterConfiguration counterSpecifier="\NetworkInterface\PacketsTransmitted" sampleRate="PT15S" unit="Count"><annotation displayName="Packets sent" locale="en-us" /></PerformanceCounterConfiguration><PerformanceCounterConfiguration counterSpecifier="\NetworkInterface\PacketsReceived" sampleRate="PT15S" unit="Count"><annotation displayName="Packets received" locale="en-us" /></PerformanceCounterConfiguration><PerformanceCounterConfiguration counterSpecifier="\NetworkInterface\BytesTotal" sampleRate="PT15S" unit="Bytes"><annotation displayName="Network total bytes" locale="en-us" /></PerformanceCounterConfiguration><PerformanceCounterConfiguration counterSpecifier="\NetworkInterface\TotalRxErrors" sampleRate="PT15S" unit="Count"><annotation displayName="Packets received errors" locale="en-us" /></PerformanceCounterConfiguration><PerformanceCounterConfiguration counterSpecifier="\NetworkInterface\TotalTxErrors" sampleRate="PT15S" unit="Count"><annotation displayName="Packets sent errors" locale="en-us" /></PerformanceCounterConfiguration><PerformanceCounterConfiguration counterSpecifier="\NetworkInterface\TotalCollisions" sampleRate="PT15S" unit="Count"><annotation displayName="Network collisions" locale="en-us" /></PerformanceCounterConfiguration>

resources.comments: Create storage accounts for environment
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_StorageAccountName'), variables('v_StorageAccounts')[parameters('env_Type')][copyIndex()].Prefix, parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), 'sa'))]

resources.comments: Create availability sets for environment
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[copyIndex()].Name, '-as'))]

resources.comments: Create virtual network for environment
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-vnet'))]

resources.comments: Public IP address required for Express Route
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-vng-ip'))]

resources.comments: Virtual Network Gateway required for Express Route
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-vng'))]

resources.comments: Connection to an existing circuit required for Express Route
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-erc'))]

resources.comments: NameServices (DNS) Security Group
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_Subnets')[1].Name, '-sg'))]

properties.description: HNAU Internal Corp Traffic - Inbound Port 22

resources.comments: Primary DNS Server NIC
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[0].Name, '-nic'))]

resources.comments: Secondary DNS Server NIC
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[1].Name, '-nic'))]

resources.comments: Primary DNS Virtual Machine
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[0].Name, '-vm'))]

settings.xmlCfg: [base64(concat(variables('wadCfgStart'), variables('wadCfgMemoryPerfCounter'), variables('wadCfgProcessorPerfCounter'), variables('wadCfgDiskPerfCounter'), variables('wadCfgNetworkPerfCounter'), variables('wadCfgResources'), toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[0].Name, '-vm')), '">', variables('wadCfgMetrics'), variables('wadCfgEnd')))]

resources.comments: Secondary DNS Virtual Machine
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[1].Name, '-vm'))]

settings.xmlCfg: [base64(concat(variables('wadCfgStart'), variables('wadCfgMemoryPerfCounter'), variables('wadCfgProcessorPerfCounter'), variables('wadCfgDiskPerfCounter'), variables('wadCfgNetworkPerfCounter'), variables('wadCfgResources'), toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[1].Name, '-vm')), '">', variables('wadCfgMetrics'), variables('wadCfgEnd')))]

resources.comments: Primary DNS Server Puppet Installation Extension
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[0].Name, '-vm','/puppetinstallscript'))]

settings.commandToExecute: [concat('sh install_puppet.sh', ' --environmentplatform="', 'azure', '" --environmentlocation="', toLower(resourceGroup().location), '" --environmentname="', toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'))), '" --environmentbrand="', toLower(variables('v_Brand')), '" --environmentdescription="', parameters('env_Description'), '" --environmenttype="', toLower(parameters('env_Type')), '" --environmentinstance="', parameters('env_Instance'), '" --environmentowner="', toLower(parameters('env_Owner')), '" --servername="', toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[0].Name, '-vm')), '" --servertype="', toLower(variables('v_ServerRoles')[0].Name), '" --serverinstance="0" --gitrepository="', parameters('env_GitRepository'), '" --gitusername="', parameters('env_GitUsername'), '" --gitpassword="', parameters('env_GitPassword'), '" --puppetserver="', parameters('env_PuppetServer'), '" --resourcegroup="', resourceGroup().name, '" --storageaccountname="', toLower(concat(variables('v_StorageAccountName'), variables('v_StorageAccounts')[parameters('env_Type')][1].Prefix, parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), 'sa')), '" --primarydns="', toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[0].Name, '-vm')), '" --secondarydns="', toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[1].Name, '-vm')), '"')]

resources.comments: Secondary DNS Server Puppet Installation Extension
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[1].Name, '-vm','/puppetinstallscript'))]

settings.commandToExecute: [concat('sh install_puppet.sh', ' --environmentplatform="', 'azure', '" --environmentlocation="', toLower(resourceGroup().location), '" --environmentname="', toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'))), '" --environmentbrand="', toLower(variables('v_Brand')), '" --environmentdescription="', parameters('env_Description'), '" --environmenttype="', toLower(parameters('env_Type')), '" --environmentinstance="', parameters('env_Instance'), '" --environmentowner="', toLower(parameters('env_Owner')), '" --servername="', toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[1].Name, '-vm')), '" --servertype="', toLower(variables('v_ServerRoles')[1].Name), '" --serverinstance="0" --gitrepository="', parameters('env_GitRepository'), '" --gitusername="', parameters('env_GitUsername'), '" --gitpassword="', parameters('env_GitPassword'), '" --puppetserver="', parameters('env_PuppetServer'), '" --resourcegroup="', resourceGroup().name, '" --storageaccountname="', toLower(concat(variables('v_StorageAccountName'), variables('v_StorageAccounts')[parameters('env_Type')][1].Prefix, parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), 'sa')), '" --primarydns="', toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[1].Name, '-vm')), '" --secondarydns="', toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-', variables('v_ServerRoles')[0].Name, '-vm')), '"')]

resources.comments: Management Layer Automation Account
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-ac'))]

resources.comments: Credentials used to run the associated runbooks
resources.name: AzureCredential

resources.comments: Subscription ID required to shutdown / startup the VM's automatically
resources.name: AzureSubscriptionId

resources.comments: Resource Group Name required to shutdown / startup the VM's automatically
resources.name: AzureResourceGroup

resources.comments: Startup Runbook - Used to start VM's
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-startup-rb'))]

properties.description: Starts all VMs at a set time

resources.comments: A start time for starting VM's
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-startup-rs'))]

resources.comments: Shutdown Runbook - Used to stop VM's
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-shutdown-rb'))]

properties.description: Shuts down all VMs at a set time

resources.comments: A shutdown time for stopping VM's
resources.name: [toLower(concat(variables('v_EnvironmentPrefix'), '-', parameters('env_Type'), parameters('env_Instance'), '-shutdown-rs'))]

resources.comments: Create a job schedule used to start VM's at a set time
resources.name: [parameters('env_jobStartScheduleGUID')]

resources.comments: Create a job schedule used to stop VM's at a set time
resources.name: [parameters('env_jobStopScheduleGUID')]
